content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position (10.5, 10.5)
Consists of steam engine (position 10.5, 10.5), boiler (position -6.0, 24.5), and offshore pump (position -9.5, 24.5)

### Iron ore mine at position (43.0, -84.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position 43.0, -84.0) and a furnace at position (45.0, -83.0)
- Burner mining drill (position -15.0, -50.0) and a chest at position (-16.5, -49.5)

### Iron plate factory at positions (40.0, -82.0), (45.0, -83.0), (42.0, -81.0), (45.0, -80.0), (40.0, -79.0)
Consists of following entities
- Furnace (position 40.0, -82.0) with no ingredients to smelt
- Furnace (position 45.0, -83.0) with no ingredients to smelt
- Furnace (position 42.0, -81.0) with no ingredients to smelt
- Furnace (position 45.0, -80.0) with no ingredients to smelt
- Furnace (position 40.0, -79.0) with no ingredients to smelt

### Lab at position (unknown)
Consists of lab with no research in progress and electrical id 24703

### Chests at positions (43.5, -82.5), (40.5, -80.5), (43.5, -81.5), (-16.5, -49.5), (2.5, 0.5), (0.5, 2.5)
Consists of chests with various inventories

### Burner inserter at positions (3.5, 0.5), (0.5, 3.5)
Consists of burner inserters with various statuses and neighbours

### Pipe groups at positions (10.5, 13.5), (-8.5, 22.5)
Consists of pipe groups with various fluids and statuses

### Electricity group with id 24703
Consists of small electric poles at positions (8.5, 9.5), (2.5, 2.5), (4.5, 5.5), (2.5, 1.5) with voltage 33

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when extracting items
- Make sure the chest at the drop position is not full before extracting items
- Ensure the entity is at the correct position before extracting items

### Errors when using extract_item function
- Check the quantity of items to extract and ensure it is not more than the available items
- Ensure the entity has enough items to extract before calling the extract_item function

### Errors when placing entities
- Ensure the tile is not occupied by another entity before placing a new entity
- Check the entity's dimensions and ensure it can fit in the tile before placing it

### Errors when using burner mining drill
- Ensure the fuel source is not full before using the burner mining drill
- Check the chest at the drop position and ensure it is not full before using the burner mining drill

### Errors when using furnace
- Ensure the furnace has ingredients to smelt before using it
- Check the furnace's fuel and ensure it is not empty before using it

### Errors when using lab
- Ensure the lab has a research in progress before using it
- Check the lab's electrical id and ensure it is valid before using it

### Errors when using pipe group
- Ensure the pipe group has a valid fluid system before using it
- Check the pipe group's fluid and ensure it is not empty before using it

### Errors when using electricity group
- Ensure the electricity group has a valid id before using it
- Check the electricity group's voltage and ensure it is within the valid range before using it
